channel.title: Comile.Bat problem
channel.description: 'Evenin, ladies and gents. I just got everything I need for a hamachi server, but when i do the whole replace Compile.Bat thing, I right click ( as said in thoraks guide) but.. the notpad option doesnt come up, and when i double click on it, it says something about Java not being internal/external... PLease help, Anyone who does will be a mod on my server, if interestid :eek: :cool: I'll pm u the info... but you gotta help first :P

item.title: Comile.Bat problem
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:

Morgarath:

'Evenin, ladies and gents. I just got everything I need for a hamachi server, but when i do the whole replace Compile.Bat thing, I right click ( as said in thoraks guide) but… the notpad option doesnt come up, and when i double click on it, it says something about Java not being internal/external… PLease help, Anyone who does will be a mod on my server, if interestid :eek: I’ll pm u the info… but you gotta help first

Answered it in m help thread .

Read full topic

item.title: Comile.Bat problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Allright, open Notepad, paste in Taharoks ‘Perfect’ Compiler, and overwrite the old one by saving it in it’s place. Not that hard. The Internal/External command error is due to you not having Java, get it here.

Read full topic

got all of that

item.title: Comile.Bat problem
item.dc:creator: @Fall_Out_Boy Fall Out Boy
item.description:
@Fall_Out_Boy wrote:

You extract it? And you have to set your paths correct and make sure you have JDK 6.0 for Mod T’s ‘Perfect Compiler’.

Read full topic
